title: Who is your favorite assassin
body: Who is your favorite assassin? Mine is {{champion:91}}  and {{champion:238}}

replies.body: {{champion:3}}  His kit in general feels really good and I feel like {{item:1415}} really synergizes with him very well, and bringing him with {{summoner:17}} in jg really benefits him. I also feel like he counters many tanks and bruisers people like to play mid.
Zed. His kit in general feels really satisfying, smooth, and fun to make big dick plays with.
{{champion:38}} He's less the one I like most, and more like the one I hate the least.
My fav assassin is garen. Garen is best kidz

Ekko.

He isn't as easily countered as many other assassins, he has safe wave-clear, he has multiple safety tools, and he has enough utility to be useful even when behind.

Though, I'm not a big fan of assassins in general.  I find that most are either too reliant on snowballing to be useful for my liking or are too easily countered.
